basic_info.name: KL University Hyderabad Admission
description: KL University Hyderabad offers admission to various UG and PG programs in the disciplines of Engineering, Management, Arts, Science and Commerce. For admissions to B.Com, BCA, B.Sc, and BBA programs, admissions are based on the scores of the Written Test and Interview conducted by the University. Admissions to BTech programs are based on KLEEE (KL Engineering Entrance Examination)/ JEE-Main/ JEE-Advanced/ State Level Engineering Entrance Exams across India and Merit in Sports/Cultural Activities. Further, at PG level, KL University Hyderabad offers only MBA programs currently. Selection for admission to MBA program is based on secured rank in KL Business School Aptitude Test (KLUBSAT)/ ICET / MAT / CAT / XAT & Personal Interview. faqs.question: Does KL University Hyderabad provides admission to international students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the KL University Hyderabad provides 15% of the seats to international students in the category of foreign nationals or dual citizens. However, the students have to meet the eligibility criteria which is equivalent to a minimum of 50% marks in their examination. The entrance exam conducted by KL University Hyderabad is exceptional for International students.

faqs.question: Is there any internship opportunities and clubs for extracurricular activities provided by KL University Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.KL University Hyderabad provides internship opportunities to students by inviting many companies to the campus. Some of the companies that provide internships are Crompton Greaves, CPRI, DRDL, IBM, Infosys, TCS, CTS, Wipro, etc. Also, the university has multiple clubs such as Hobby Club, Social service activities, technical festivals, cultural festivals, and NSS Activities to encourage the student's extracurricular activities.

faqs.question: How to apply to KL University through offline mode?
faqs.answer: Ans.The application form will be available in the admission office of KL University Hyderabad. Fill out the application form with all the details and pay the application fee in the form of a DD of INR 1000. submit all the documents required along with DD and application form to the admission office.

faqs.question: Which is better: KL University Hyderabad or Vijayawada?
faqs.answer: Ans.The main and primary campus is located at Vijayawada. There is no difference between these two campuses as the curriculum, and placements are the same. The difference between both campuses is the location and the number of courses offered. KL University Vijayawada offers more courses.

faqs.question: How to prepare for KLEEE and Does KLEEE has a negative marking?
faqs.answer: Ans.There is no negative marking in the KLEEE entrance test. All questions carry equal marks. You may prepare by solving sample papers or previous year’s question papers of KLEEE.

faqs.question: How is the placement trend of KL University Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.Looking at the placement statistics provided by KL University Hyderabad, the university had the highest salary package of 56 LPA in this year. The university welcomed about 550 companies in 2023 which is comparatively higher than the past 2 years. Thus, KL University has improved its placements every year.

faqs.question: Does KL University Hyderabad provide educational loans during admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, students can avail of educational loans during counseling at KL University Hyderabad. Listing here is some of the banks that provide educational loans to students.ICICI Bank Ltd.HDFC BankPunjab National BankKotak Mahindra BankAxis BankFederal Bank

faqs.question: What documents are required to apply for an educational loan At KL University in Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.PAN card, Aadhar card, passport size photo, mark sheets, college admission letter, and entrance score sheet are some of the documents required to get a loan.

faqs.question: How much does the hostel charge at KL University in Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee varies depending on the room that the student opts for. There are single-bed and double-bed sharing with AC and Non-AC facilities.For Non AC double sharing room – INR 1.10 LPAFor Non AC single sharing room – INR 1.20 LPAFor AC double sharing room – INR 1.20 LPAFor AC single sharing room – INR 1.35 LPA

faqs.question: How is the environment of KL University Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.KL university is very strict as they stick to their discipline and student code of conduct. They have an anti-ragging committee. Another fact is that the university allows students to choose their faculty and are divided into sections. Mobile phones are not allowed inside the campus and the dress code has to be strictly followed

It was accredited A++ grade by NAAC and Category-I Institution Status by the UGC for excellence in technical education.
